bibl.title: Papers Presented at the Fourteenth International Conference on Patristic Studies Held in Oxford 2003. Liturgia et Cultus, Theologica et Philosophica, Critica et Philologica, Nachleben, First Two Centuries
bibl.seg: DE BRUYN Theodore S., The Use of the Sanctus in Christian Greek Papyrus Amulets.

F. YOUNG, M. EDWARDS and P. PARVIS (Edd.), Papers Presented at the Fourteenth International Conference on Patristic Studies Held in Oxford 2003. Liturgia et Cultus, Theologica et Philosophica, Critica et Philologica, Nachleben, First Two Centuries = Studia Patristica. 40 (Leuven, 2006) pp. 15-19.
